sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import Box from '@mui/material/Box';
import Grid from '@mui/material/Grid';
import { Formik, Field, Form } from 'formik';




function DailyTaskForm(props) {
    const [taskdata, setTaskData] = React.useState({
        // task_name: "",
        // category: "",
        // jira_id: "",
        // Assignee: "",
        // Status: "",
        // due_date: "",
        // go_live: "",
        // mock_up: "",
        // other_comments: ""
    })
    const handleSubmit = (value) => {
     console.log(Object.keys(value))
     setTaskData(...taskdata,)
     console.log(taskdata,"sdsd")
    }
    return (
        <Box className='section'>
            <Box className='container task-form'>
                <Formik
                    initialValues={taskdata}
                    onSubmit={values=>handleSubmit(values)}
                >
                    <Form>
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item md={5} >
                                <Field type="text" name='task_name'  placeholder='Task Name' />
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item md={5}>
                                <Field as="select" name="category">
                                    <option value="">Select Cotegory</option>
                                    <option value="Bug">Bug Task</option>
                                    <option value="Dev">Dev</option>
                                    <option value="staging">staging</option>
                                </Field>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item md={2}>
                                <Field type="text" name='jira_id' placeholder='Jira ID' />
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid container spacing={2} mt={1}>
                            <Grid item md={3} >
                                <Field as="select" name="Assignee">
                                    <option value="">Select Assignee</option>
                                    <option value="Rohan">Rohan</option>
                                    <option value="Kriti">Kriti</option>
                                    <option value="Archana">Archana</option>
                                </Field>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item md={3}>
                                <Field as="select" name="Status">
                                    <option value="">Select Status</option>
                                    <option value="Completed">Completed</option>
                                    <option value="Pending">Pending</option>
                                    <option value="Processing">Processing</option>
                                </Field>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item md={3}>
                                <Field type="date"  name='due_date' />
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item md={3}>
                                <Field type="date"  name='go_live' />
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid container spacing={2} mt={1}>
                            <Grid item md={12}>
                                <Field type="textarea" name='mock_up' placeholder='Mock UP' />
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid container spacing={2} mt={1}>
                            <Grid item md={12}>
                                <Field as="textarea" name='other_comments'  placeholder='Other Comments' rows="4" />
                                <button type='submit'>Submit</button>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </Form>
                </Formik>
            </Box>
        </Box>
    );
}

export default DailyTaskForm;
